data.title: B Gen / B Link Aftershocks For Behind B Site Boxes
data.description: Here's are two Aftershocks from B Generator and B Link that can either push players out from behind the cover of the B Site Boxes, or deny / delay Spike plant.

data.title: Early Round A Rope To A Hall Faultine / Flashpoint Combo
data.description: Here's a great early round setup from Upper A Rope for A Hall to support a teammate's push into A Main and help a teammate take space in A Main.

data.title: Early Round B Link To B Bench Faultline / Aftershock Combo
data.description: Here's a great setup from B Link for B Arcade to support a teammate's push into B Arcade / B Bench.
